title: (x) Judy Cormier - Onyx {Chesh}
content:
I've tried Bodoni Poster Compressed. Is there any other font that looks like this?   
   
PLEASE HELP.   
THANKS ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200939im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/18253.gif)

 [‹ (x) Looking for ITC Conduit for free](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200939/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1415 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pirates of the Caribbean movie font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200939/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1434 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: Actually, [Onyx MT](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200939/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/onyx-mt/onyx-mt/testdrive.html?s=JUDY%2BCORMIER&p=96) may be closer, with its smaller serifs, though both Onyxes are extremely close to Bodoni Poster Condensed. The only real difference I can tell is that the counters are a little more open in the Onyxes.

Yes. I bow to the Chesh. You are most definitely the man. Onyx MT is much closer than Onyx BT.   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200939im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Yep, that very same poor excuse for a record cover. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200939im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/wink.gif)
